body_html:
Hello all!
I was running in the same issue and finally managed to make it work after resume without rebooting the computer.

You just need to rmmod the nvidia module (and all dependent modules, in my case nvidia_uvm) and then modprobe them again (in reverse order):

sudo rmmod nvidia_uvm
sudo rmmod nvidia
sudo modprobe nvidia
sudo modprobe nvidia_uvm

Hope this helps :)

body:
Hello all!
I was running in the same issue and finally managed to make it work after resume without rebooting the computer.

You just need to `rmmod` the `nvidia` module (and all dependent modules, in my case `nvidia_uvm`) and then `modprobe` them again (in reverse order):

```
sudo rmmod nvidia_uvm
sudo rmmod nvidia
sudo modprobe nvidia
sudo modprobe nvidia_uvm
```

Hope this helps :)
